nodes.excerpt: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.

localize.tagline: iOS上的一款精美的音乐播放器

nodes.excerpt: Zealth is building a software to help hospitals provide continuous round the clock monitoring to their cancer patients, once they leave the hospital and alerts them if the patient is at high risk.
nodes.title: Zealth - SaaS for remote monitoring of cancer patients
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Zealth正在打造一款软件，帮助医院为癌症患者提供连续的全天候监测，一旦患者离开医院，如果患者处于高危状态，就会发出警报。

nodes.excerpt: Make smarter trades by getting real-time alerts from Contora that are triggered by data from unusual sources — such as Reddit mentions, recent company jobs postings and firings, viral posts on social media, and much more.
nodes.title: Contora - Better trades with real-time data from unusual sources
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 通过从Contora获得实时警报，使交易更加智能，这些警报由来自不寻常来源的数据触发--例如Reddit提及、最近的公司工作岗位发布和解雇、社交媒体上的病毒性帖子等等。
localize.tagline: 利用来自不同寻常来源的实时数据进行更好的交易

localize.description: 通過從Contora獲得實時警報，使交易更加智能，這些警報由來自不尋常來源的數據觸發--例如Reddit提及、最近的公司工作崗位發佈和解僱、社交媒體上的病毒性帖子等等。
localize.tagline: 利用來自不同尋常來源的實時數據進行更好的交易

nodes.excerpt: Prize Card™ is a debit card that lets you win money and rewards instantly every time you use it. When you pay using Prize Card™ the merchant (i.e. the store) pays us a small transaction fee which we use to fund giveaways.

localize.tagline: 奖励丰厚的借记卡

localize.description: Prize Card™是一種借記卡，讓您每次使用時都能立即贏得金錢和獎勵。當您使用Prize Card™付款時，商家（即商店）會向我們支付少量的交易費，我們將其用於資助贈品。

nodes.excerpt: The app shows the UTC time in the menu bar or a Notification Center widget. This can be useful as a quick reference. You can also quickly copy the date & time in ISO8601 format. The app is free and requires macOS 11.1.
nodes.title: UTC Time - Show the time in UTC in the menu bar or a widget
nodes.author: Sindre Sorhus

localize.description: 该应用程序在菜单栏或通知中心小部件中显示UTC时间。这可以作为一个快速的参考。你也可以快速复制ISO8601格式的日期和时间。该应用程序是免费的，需要macOS 11.1。
localize.tagline: 在菜单栏或小部件中以UTC显示时间。

localize.description: 該應用程序在菜單欄或通知中心小部件中顯示UTC時間。這可以作爲一個快速的參考。你也可以快速複製ISO8601格式的日期和時間。該應用程序是免費的，需要macOS 11.1。

nodes.excerpt: SaaS Competition is increasing rapidly. The more competition a company faces, the harder it is to get clients. If you don’t have strong positioning on the market, use this worksheet to create unique positioning. The Worksheet is FREE until 25th March.
nodes.title: SaaS Positioning Worksheet - Worksheet to create $1M SaaS positioning
nodes.author: Anton Cherkasov

localize.description: SaaS的竞争正在迅速增加。公司面临的竞争越大，获得客户的难度就越大。如果你在市场上没有强大的定位，请使用这个工作表来创建独特的定位。该工作表在3月25日之前是免费的。
localize.tagline: 打造100万SaaS定位的工作表

nodes.excerpt: What is possible with AR? We don't even know yet. But innovative and creative people are already developing interesting apps and solutions using augmented reality. Check out our AR collection.

localize.description: AR有什么可能？我们甚至还不知道。但创新和创意的人们已经在使用增强现实开发有趣的应用程序和解决方案。看看我们的AR系列。

nodes.excerpt: The Awesome lists on GitHub are great, but it's hard to know which projects are actively maintained and sift through them all easily. I built this tool to help me visualize and query all of the cool resources people put together.
nodes.title: Awesome Viewer - Visualize all of Github's awesome lists
nodes.author: Aryaman Sharda

localize.description: GitHub上的Awesome列表很不错，但很难知道哪些项目是积极维护的，也很难轻松地筛选出所有项目。我建立了这个工具来帮助我可视化和查询所有人们放在一起的酷炫资源。
localize.tagline: 可视化Github的所有精彩列表。

localize.description: GitHub上的Awesome列表很不錯，但很難知道哪些項目是積極維護的，也很難輕鬆地篩選出所有項目。我建立了這個工具來幫助我可視化和查詢所有人們放在一起的酷炫資源。
localize.tagline: 可視化Github的所有精彩列表。

nodes.excerpt: Best10 offers unrivalled daily support at your fingertips and in the comfort of your own home. Receive daily checkins with your certified coach, a 100% personalised workout and eating plan, complete with shopping lists and recipes.
nodes.title: Best10 - 100% personalised workouts, eating plan & a certified coach.
nodes.author: Mike Metelerkamp

localize.description: Best10为您提供无与伦比的日常支持，让您在家中就能享受到舒适的生活。每天都会收到您的认证教练的检查，100%个性化的锻炼和饮食计划，以及完整的购物清单和食谱。
localize.tagline: 100%个性化的锻炼，饮食计划和认证教练。

nodes.excerpt: Guardians is a personal safety app designed to be used with your close family & trusted friends. It starts with location sharing but it’s lot more than that.
nodes.title: Guardians - A safety app for women
nodes.author: Nakul Kabra

localize.description: Guardians是一款专为你的亲密家人和值得信赖的朋友而设计的个人安全应用。它从位置共享开始，但它的功能远不止于此。
localize.tagline: 妇女的安全应用

nodes.excerpt: Kintell is a platform that connects people looking for advice with those qualified to give it, via paid and Pro Bono video consultations. Browse for an Advisor, book in a session, and speak to them via the Kintell video platform.
nodes.title: Kintell - 1-to-1 video advice and tuition from vetted professionals
nodes.author: Todd Soulas

localize.description: Kintell是一个平台，通过付费和公益视频咨询，将寻求建议的人与有资格提供建议的人联系起来。通过Kintell视频平台，浏览顾问，预订会话，并与他们交谈。
localize.tagline: 经过审核的专业人员提供1对1的视频建议和指导。

localize.description: Kintell是一個平臺，通過付費和公益視頻諮詢，將尋求建議的人與有資格提供建議的人聯繫起來。通過Kintell視頻平臺，瀏覽顧問，預訂會話，並與他們交談。
localize.tagline: 經過審覈的專業人員提供1對1的視頻建議和指導。

nodes.excerpt: OpenReel empowers distributed enterprise, media, entertainment, and agency teams to remotely control, direct, script, film, and collaborate on high definition video projects from a mobile device or webcam in over 125 countries
nodes.title: OpenReel - Simple remote video production
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

localize.description: OpenReel使分布式企业、媒体、娱乐和代理团队能够在超过125个国家通过移动设备或网络摄像头对高清视频项目进行远程控制、导演、编剧、拍摄和协作。
localize.tagline: 简单的远程视频制作

localize.description: OpenReel使分佈式企業、媒體、娛樂和代理團隊能夠在超過125個國家通過移動設備或網絡攝像頭對高清視頻項目進行遠程控制、導演、編劇、拍攝和協作。
localize.tagline: 簡單的遠程視頻製作

nodes.excerpt: Papercups EU is an open source live customer chat tool that is hosted in the EU for GDPR compliance purposes. We provide React/React Native/Flutter/HTML chat components for a ton of flexibility and customizability.
nodes.title: Papercups EU - Open source live chat tool hosted in EU
nodes.author: Kam Leung

localize.description: Papercups EU 是一个开源的即时客户聊天工具，出于 GDPR 合规性的目的，它被托管在欧盟。我们提供React/React Native/Flutter/HTML聊天组件，提供大量的灵活性和可定制性。
localize.tagline: 开源的即时聊天工具，托管在欧盟

localize.description: Papercups EU 是一個開源的即時客戶聊天工具，出於 GDPR 合規性的目的，它被託管在歐盟。我們提供React/React Native/Flutter/HTML聊天組件，提供大量的靈活性和可定製性。
localize.tagline: 開源的即時聊天工具，託管在歐盟
